title: Bistro Trains Ex-Inmates In the Art Of Fine Dining
teaser: A French restaurant in Cleveland not only offers artisan cuisine, it also gives former inmates a job and the chance to learn a new skill.
contentencoded:
EDWINS, a French restaurant in Cleveland’s Shaker Square, celebrates its one year anniversary this month.
